content: I've been doing a load of laundry every other day, which has been a game-changer. I used to let it pile up for weeks, and then I'd have to spend hours doing it all at once. Now, I just throw a load in the washing machine in the morning, and it's ready to be folded and put away by the evening. I've also been trying to put away my clean laundry immediately, instead of leaving it in the laundry basket. It's been really helpful in keeping my closet organized and clutter-free. Do you have any tips on how to organize my pantry?
